About Me

This is a really quick brief about "us"...

BIO

My name is Nguyen Quoc Dung a.k.a Jessi Dung. I’m a third-year RMIT university student. My hobbies are really simple, playing games, watching movies, listening to instrumental music and of course, texting and surfing facebook in the toilet :> I want to become a professional Character/Background 2d/3d Artist and also have a range of knowledge in graphic design. I do have interest in streetwear fashion also :>

Character artist

Level: Intermediate

I am new at this field of art, a year ago I can only draw Stickman which is not really a bad drawing style but I think it’s time to be better and chase my dream as a professional 3d character game artist. So I have followed lots of online tutorials and also taken classes at school to develop my skills. There are some of my works in my portfolio, feel free to have a look.

Background artist

Level: Intermediate

At first, the only thing that I want is just drawing characters, but after having some range of knowledge in drawing character and also being inspired by many awesome digital drawings on internet and also various mediums paintings. I decided to land a foot in this area to have some experience.There are some of my works in my portfolio, feel free to have a look.

Graphic designer

Level: Elementary

This is not my major but i also have lots of interest in it. I have learnt art theory and graphic designing in university for nearly 2 years, thus I have some ranges of experience in this field but not too confident to say I’m on high level. But I’m willing to achieve more experience in this interesting art field.There are some of my works in my portfolio, feel free to have a look.
